oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harvey family home
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Exterior view of house owned by J. O. Harvey. There is a bench swing in the yard to the left. Harvey (1854-1929) was married to Addie Bailey Harvey (1857-1940). They had four children. One of their daughters, Lillie Harvey Harrell (1881-1924) was married to professor Elmer H. Harrell (1875-1968), a teacher at McLemoresville Collegiate Institute. Another daughter, Bertie Estelle Harvey Evans (1893-1979) married Henry Bascom Evans (1896-1977), the president of Bethel College.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Houses; Swings
